column2: It would seem the majority of the population in [current_silk_road_religion_spread_province.GetName] has converted to the [current_silk_road_religion_spread_province.Religion.GetName] faith, likely as a result of a recent influx of Silk Road merchants from the busy markets of [starting_silk_road_religion_spread_province.GetName].
